name: Pig Face
tldr: Represents pigs, overeating, indulgence, or can be used affectionately or as an insult.

contextMeanings.meaning: Referring to actual pigs or farm animals.
Eating a lot or indulging in food.
contextMeanings.example: Ate so much at the buffet 游냥

contextMeanings.meaning: Can be affectionate or playfully teasing.
contextMeanings.example: You ate all the cookies 游냥
Third slice of cake, don't judge 游냥

platformNotes.note: Used in food posts and indulgence content.
Common in mukbang and overeating content.
Used playfully among friends about food.

generationalNotes.note: Often used self-deprecatingly about eating too much.
Used for food content and cute pig references.
May use more straightforwardly for pigs or be cautious due to insult potential.

warnings.title: Context Dependent
warnings.description: Can be an insult if used to call someone a pig. Use carefully with acquaintances.

seoTitle: 游냥 Pig Face Emoji Meaning - What Does 游냥 Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the pig face emoji 游냥 really means in texting. Often means indulging in food. Complete context guide.
